charges.charge_description: 18:2113(a).F BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for a term of 70 months on each count, with all terms to be served concurrently to each other and all undischarged terms of imprisonment followed by a 3 year concurrent term of S/R.

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for a term of 70 months on each count, with all terms to be served concurrently to each other and all undischarged terms of imprisonment followed by a 3 year concurrent term of S/R.
